name: Shark IO (itch)
description:
Arrow keys to move

F to dash

C for harpoon (When above water)

The main character wakes up and notices his sister is not home in the middle of Finland.He then finds a smudged note saying (unreadable) I have taken your sister!

(unreadable) if you ever want to see (unreadable) again! He then sets out to save his
sister! Along the way, he defeats punnily named villains with ridiculous power-ups. The levels he encounters may or may not have action related events that are triggered by the player.
